events.name: Pittsburgh Penguins at New Jersey Devils

headlines.description: — Paul Cotter scored the shootout winner, Jake Allen stopped 33 of the 34 shots he faced in regulation and overtime and the New Jersey Devils beat the Pittsburgh Penguins 2-1 on Saturday to take sole possession of first place in the NHL's Metropolitan...
headlines.shortLinkText: Devils beat the Penguins 2-1 in a shootout to take over 1st place in the Metropolitan Division

headlines.description: — The Ottawa Senators tried and failed to play keep-away with a one-goal lead and had to go to overtime to beat the Philadelphia Flyers 3-2 on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Tim Stutzle scores in overtime to give the Senators a 3-2 win over the Flyers

headlines.description: — Adam Erne and Sam Steel scored 47 seconds apart midway through the third period rally the Dallas Stars to a 5-4 victory over the Nashville Predators on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Sam Steel's third period goal completes Stars 5-4 comeback over Predators

events.name: Boston Bruins at Toronto Maple Leafs

headlines.description: — Fraser Minten scored against his former team and Jeremy Swayman made 30 saves as the Boston Bruins beat the sloppy Toronto Maple Leafs 5-3 on Saturday night for their sixth straight victory.
headlines.shortLinkText: Minten scores against former team as Bruins beat Maple Leafs 5-3 for 6th straight win

headlines.description: — Brandon Hagel scored the tiebreaking goal 8:42 into the third period and the Tampa Bay Lightning beat the Washington Capitals 3-2 on Saturday night.

events.name: New York Islanders at New York Rangers

headlines.description: — Bo Horvat scored twice to move into a tie for the NHL lead and the New York Islanders kept the New York Rangers winless on home ice with a 5-0 victory over their biggest rival Saturday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Bo Horvat scores twice as Islanders keep Rangers winless at home with 5-0 rout

headlines.description: — Andrei Svechnikov, Jesperi Kotkaniemi and Charles Alexis Legault each had a goal and an assist and the Carolina Hurricanes extended their winning streak to three games with a 6-3 victory over the Buffalo Sabres on Saturday night.

events.name: Seattle Kraken at St. Louis Blues

headlines.description: — Shane Wright scored 1:57 into in overtime after Chandler Stevenson tied the game with two seconds left in regulation and the Seattle Kraken beat the St. Louis Blues 4-3 on Saturday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Wright scores in overtime to give Kraken a 4-3 win over Blues

headlines.description: — Nathan MacKinnon had two goals and two assists, Cale Makar, Parker Kelly and Jack Drury also scored twice and the Western Conference-leading Colorado Avalanche embarrassed the Edmonton Oilers 9-1 on Saturday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Nathan MacKinnon has 2 goals and 2 assists in the Avalanche's 9-1 romp over the Oilers

events.name: Anaheim Ducks at Vegas Golden Knights

headlines.description: — Jacob Trouba scored at 4:28 of overtime and Anaheim scoring leader Leo Carlsson had his first two-goal game of the season in the red-hot Ducks' 4-3 victory over the Vegas Golden Knights on Saturday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Jacob Trouba scores in OT to lift the Ducks past the Golden Knights, 4-3
